scripts.start: npm run build:happ && npm run start:agent
scripts.network: npm run build:happ && concurrently-repeat "npm run start:agent"
scripts.start:agent: cross-env HC_PORT=$(port) HC_ADMIN_PORT=$(port) concurrently "npm run playground" "npm run start:happ" "sleep 5 && npm run start -w ui"
scripts.restart:agent: cross-env HC_PORT=$(port) HC_ADMIN_PORT=$(port) concurrently "npm run playground" "npm run restart:happ" "sleep 5 && npm run start -w ui"
scripts.test: npm run build:happ && time npm t -w tests
scripts.test:sweet: rm -f dnas/**/workdir/*.dna && npm run build:happ && set -x && RUST_BACKTRACE=1 time cargo test -- --nocapture
scripts.start:happ: hc s clean && echo pass | RUST_LOG=warn hc s --piped -f=$HC_ADMIN_PORT generate ./workdir/clutter.happ --run=$HC_PORT -a clutter network mdns
scripts.restart:happ: echo pass | RUST_LOG=warn hc s --piped -f=$HC_ADMIN_PORT run -p=$HC_PORT
scripts.package: npm run build:happ && npm run package:ui && hc web-app pack workdir
scripts.package:ui: npm run build -w ui && cd ui/dist && bestzip ../dist.zip *
scripts.build:happ: npm run build:dnas && hc app pack ./workdir
scripts.build:dnas: npm run build:zomes && hc dna pack ./dnas/clutter/workdir
